FilterRule.description: Specifies which files folders and objects to include or exclude when transferring files from source to destination.

FilterType.description: The type of filter rule to apply. AWS DataSync only supports the SIMPLE_PATTERN rule type.
FilterType.markdownDescription:
The type of filter rule to apply. AWS DataSync only supports the SIMPLE_PATTERN rule type.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SIMPLE_PATTERN  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[A-Z0-9_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: A single filter string that consists of the patterns to include or exclude. The patterns are delimited by "|".
Value.markdownDescription:
A single filter string that consists of the patterns to include or exclude. The patterns are delimited by "|".

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 409600  
Pattern: ^[^\x00]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterRule.markdownDescription:
Specifies which files folders and objects to include or exclude when transferring files from source to destination.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskReportConfig.description: Specifies how you want to configure a task report, which provides detailed information about for your Datasync transfer.

Destination.description: Specifies where DataSync uploads your task report.
Destination.markdownDescription:
Specifies where DataSync uploads your task report.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

OutputType.description: Specifies the type of task report that you want.
OutputType.markdownDescription:
Specifies the type of task report that you want.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SUMMARY_ONLY | STANDARD  
Update requires: No interruption

ReportLevel.description: Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.
ReportLevel.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ERRORS_ONLY | SUCCESSES_AND_ERRORS  
Update requires: No interruption

ObjectVersionIds.description: Specifies whether your task report includes the new version of each object transferred into an S3 bucket, this only applies if you enable versioning on your bucket.
ObjectVersionIds.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether your task report includes the new version of each object transferred into an S3 bucket, this only applies if you enable versioning on your bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: INCLUDE | NONE  
Update requires: No interruption

Overrides.description: Customizes the reporting level for aspects of your task report. For example, your report might generally only include errors, but you could specify that you want a list of successes and errors just for the files that Datasync attempted to delete in your destination location.

Transferred.description: Specifies the level of reporting for the files, objects, and directories that Datasync attempted to transfer.

ReportLevel.description: Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.
ReportLevel.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ERRORS_ONLY | SUCCESSES_AND_ERRORS  
Update requires: No interruption

Transferred.markdownDescription:
Specifies the level of reporting for the files, objects, and directories that Datasync attempted to transfer.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ReportLevel.description: Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.
ReportLevel.markdownDescription:

Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Deleted.description: Specifies the level of reporting for the files, objects, and directories that Datasync attempted to delete in your destination location. This only applies if you configure your task to delete data in the destination that isn't in the source.

ReportLevel.description: Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.
ReportLevel.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether you want your task report to include only what went wrong with your transfer or a list of what succeeded and didn't.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ERRORS_ONLY | SUCCESSES_AND_ERRORS  
Update requires: No interruption

Deleted.markdownDescription:
Specifies the level of reporting for the files, objects, and directories that Datasync attempted to delete in your destination location. This only applies if you configure your task to delete data in the destination that isn't in the source.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ReportLevel.markdownDescription:

Specifies how you want to configure a task report, which provides detailed information about for your Datasync transfer.

TaskReportConfigDestinationS3.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 bucket where DataSync uploads your task report.

Subdirectory.description: Specifies a bucket prefix for your report.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
Specifies a bucket prefix for your report.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\p{Zs}]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

BucketAccessRoleArn.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM policy that allows Datasync to upload a task report to your S3 bucket.
BucketAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM policy that allows Datasync to upload a task report to your S3 bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketArn.description: Specifies the ARN of the S3 bucket where Datasync uploads your report.
S3BucketArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the ARN of the S3 bucket where Datasync uploads your report.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 156  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):(s3|s3-outposts):[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]*:.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskReportConfigDestinationS3.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon S3 bucket where DataSync uploads your task report.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ManifestConfig.description: Configures a manifest, which is a list of files or objects that you want DataSync to transfer.

Action.description: Specifies what DataSync uses the manifest for.
Action.markdownDescription:
Specifies what DataSync uses the manifest for.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TRANSFER  
Update requires: No interruption

Format.description: Specifies the file format of your manifest.
Format.markdownDescription:
Specifies the file format of your manifest.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CSV  
Update requires: No interruption

Source.description: Specifies the manifest that you want DataSync to use and where it's hosted.
Source.markdownDescription:
Specifies the manifest that you want DataSync to use and where it's hosted.

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

ManifestConfig.markdownDescription:
Configures a manifest, which is a list of files or objects that you want DataSync to transfer.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ManifestConfigSourceS3.description: Specifies the S3 bucket where you're hosting the manifest that you want AWS DataSync to use.

ManifestObjectPath.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 object key of your manifest.
ManifestObjectPath.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon S3 object key of your manifest.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{M}\p{Z}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\p{C}]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

BucketAccessRoleArn.description: Specifies the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows DataSync to access your manifest.
BucketAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows DataSync to access your manifest.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketArn.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket where you're hosting your manifest.
S3BucketArn.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket where you're hosting your manifest.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 156  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):(s3|s3-outposts):[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]*:.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ManifestObjectVersionId.description: Specifies the object version ID of the manifest that you want DataSync to use.
ManifestObjectVersionId.markdownDescription:
Specifies the object version ID of the manifest that you want DataSync to use.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ManifestConfigSourceS3.markdownDescription:
Specifies the S3 bucket where you're hosting the manifest that you want AWS DataSync to use.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ScheduleExpression.description: A cron expression that specifies when AWS DataSync initiates a scheduled transfer from a source to a destination location
ScheduleExpression.markdownDescription:
A cron expression that specifies when AWS DataSync initiates a scheduled transfer from a source to a destination location

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\ \_\*\?\,\|\^\-\/\#\s\(\)\+]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
Specifies status of a schedule.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskSchedule.markdownDescription:
Specifies the schedule you want your task to use for repeated executions.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Options.description: Represents the options that are available to control the behavior of a StartTaskExecution operation.

Atime.description: A file metadata value that shows the last time a file was accessed (that is, when the file was read or written to).
Atime.markdownDescription:
A file metadata value that shows the last time a file was accessed (that is, when the file was read or written to).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | BEST_EFFORT  
Update requires: No interruption

BytesPerSecond.description: A value that limits the bandwidth used by AWS DataSync.
BytesPerSecond.markdownDescription:
A value that limits the bandwidth used by AWS DataSync.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Gid.description: The group ID (GID) of the file's owners.
Gid.markdownDescription:
The group ID (GID) of the file's owners.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | INT_VALUE | NAME | BOTH  
Update requires: No interruption

LogLevel.description: A value that determines the types of logs that DataSync publishes to a log stream in the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you provide.
LogLevel.markdownDescription:
A value that determines the types of logs that DataSync publishes to a log stream in the Amazon CloudWatch log group that you provide.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OFF | BASIC | TRANSFER  
Update requires: No interruption

Mtime.description: A value that indicates the last time that a file was modified (that is, a file was written to) before the PREPARING phase.
Mtime.markdownDescription:
A value that indicates the last time that a file was modified (that is, a file was written to) before the PREPARING phase.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

OverwriteMode.description: A value that determines whether files at the destination should be overwritten or preserved when copying files.
OverwriteMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether files at the destination should be overwritten or preserved when copying files.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALWAYS | NEVER  
Update requires: No interruption

PosixPermissions.description: A value that determines which users or groups can access a file for a specific purpose such as reading, writing, or execution of the file.
PosixPermissions.markdownDescription:
A value that determines which users or groups can access a file for a specific purpose such as reading, writing, or execution of the file.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

PreserveDeletedFiles.description: A value that specifies whether files in the destination that don't exist in the source file system should be preserved.
PreserveDeletedFiles.markdownDescription:
A value that specifies whether files in the destination that don't exist in the source file system should be preserved.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRESERVE | REMOVE  
Update requires: No interruption

PreserveDevices.description: A value that determines whether AWS DataSync should preserve the metadata of block and character devices in the source file system, and recreate the files with that device name and metadata on the destination.
PreserveDevices.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether AWS DataSync should preserve the metadata of block and character devices in the source file system, and recreate the files with that device name and metadata on the destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | PRESERVE  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityDescriptorCopyFlags.description: A value that determines which components of the SMB security descriptor are copied during transfer.
SecurityDescriptorCopyFlags.markdownDescription:
A value that determines which components of the SMB security descriptor are copied during transfer.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | OWNER_DACL | OWNER_DACL_SACL  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskQueueing.description: A value that determines whether tasks should be queued before executing the tasks.
TaskQueueing.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether tasks should be queued before executing the tasks.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TransferMode.description: A value that determines whether DataSync transfers only the data and metadata that differ between the source and the destination location, or whether DataSync transfers all the content from the source, without comparing to the destination location.
TransferMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether DataSync transfers only the data and metadata that differ between the source and the destination location, or whether DataSync transfers all the content from the source, without comparing to the destination location.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CHANGED | ALL  
Update requires: No interruption

Uid.description: The user ID (UID) of the file's owner.
Uid.markdownDescription:
The user ID (UID) of the file's owner.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | INT_VALUE | NAME | BOTH  
Update requires: No interruption

VerifyMode.description: A value that determines whether a data integrity verification should be performed at the end of a task execution after all data and metadata have been transferred.
VerifyMode.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether a data integrity verification should be performed at the end of a task execution after all data and metadata have been transferred.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: POINT_IN_TIME_CONSISTENT | ONLY_FILES_TRANSFERRED | NONE  
Update requires: No interruption

ObjectTags.description: A value that determines whether object tags should be read from the source object store and written to the destination object store.
ObjectTags.markdownDescription:
A value that determines whether object tags should be read from the source object store and written to the destination object store.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRESERVE | NONE  
Update requires: No interruption
